# Onboarding Tasks for New Collaborators 

## Collaborator Checklist

1. Add the following information to Collaborator Contact Information file

[] orcid id
[] github account
[] email

2. Review and Sign 

[] Data Use Agreement
[] Authorship Guidelines

## Admin Checklist

Add the new collaborator as a user to the following: 

[] Slack
[] HerbVar Zotero group
[] Relevant Github Access
